msbt.message: Why, hello. I'm Labelthe fashion designer. I'm not sure if you've heard of meI mean, I only recently decided to become an independent designer. So, you might say I'm still in training. But that's why I'm traveling to lots of different places. I want to see and learn about as many styles as I can.
Oh, we meet again. You know, there's still so much to learn about design here on .

In fact, I wonder if maybe you might help me with a little style exercise? It goes like this I'll call out a specific fashion theme, and then you change into an outfit that matches that theme. You'll have to model it for me, of course. But I'll give you a gift for your trouble.
Sure, why not.
I don't know about that.
Oh! You meanyou don't mind helping me?
I'll help you!
No. I can't right now.
Wonderful! Thank you so much!<10_4 /> Let's get to it
Oh. I see If you change your mind, please let me know.
Oh, hello there. I'm here on to study design some more. If it's not an impositionwould you mind doing another style session with me?
Oh, it's . Hello there!I've stopped by again to continue my fashion studies.If you don't mind, it would be great if you could help me out again.
I'll give you some clothing so you have an idea of the look I'm going for.

There you go. It's .All you have to do is keep this piece in mind as you put together outfit. If you're not sure what to do, just wear something that would go well with it. If you coordinate everything from head to toe, that would be sooo "fab." Well, that's what they say in the fashion business, anyway.
Hmmmperhaps not. You're already carrying so many things, I don't think I could add another. Come talk to me once your pockets aren't quite so stuffed and I'll give it to you then.
I'll be waiting right here, so come back anytime.
You see, it's .Now, try to put together an entire outfit with "" written all over it. If that sounds too hard, just wear some items that look like they'd go nicely with what I gave you.
Hmmit seems you already have too many things on you.Empty your pockets a bit and then come back so I can give it to you.
I'll be waiting right here, OK?
As you can see, it's with quite the "" flair. Now, be sure to coordinate your look in a way that shows off your design sense too.
Oh, but, . We've got a bit of an issue Your pockets are so full. Maybe you could come by later when you've made some room?
Don't worry. I'll be right here.
Oh, um Please be sure to wear both a top and bottom.
Um Please wear at least a top and bottom.
Oh, be sure to wear both a top and bottom at least. Pretty please!
I see you've changed clothes.<10_4 /> Can I take a look at the outfit you came up with?
Sure, of course.
Not yet.
Ah, it looks like you've changed clothes. Might I see that outfit?
Of course!
I'm not ready.
Oh, hey! I see you changed! Would you mind if I looked over your outfit more closely?
OK!
I need more time.
Oh, I see. Well, that's fine. I will be waiting here.
No problem. I'll be here when you're ready.
That's totally fine. Whenever you're ready, I'll be right here.
Oh, by the way, I haven't given the clothes to you yet.

Um I do believe you've dressed yourself up with a wand outfit, yes?It would be troublesome to have your outfit revert while I'm examining it.If you could, please revert your outfit before I check it over.
Oh, , are you wearing a wand outfit?I'd like to check your style after you revert the outfit. Just let me know when you're ready.
Oh, ! You're wearing a wand outfit, aren't you? You can't fool me. Just revert that outfit, and get your look all put together. And be sure to let me know when you're ready!

Hey, soit looks like you might be busy doing some island-design work. But, ehwhen you show me your outfit, please don't wear that helmet.I can wait until you're done working. Just let me know when you're ready.

Oh, ! Are you doing some island designing right now? You know I love designing things too, butPlease don't forget to take off your helmet before you show me your outfit, OK? I don't mind waiting until you're done. Just tell me when you're ready.

Ah, ! It looks like you're having fun designing the island right now. I know how absorbing design work can be, so I hate to interruptBut, you know, that helmet might throw off your look. So I'll just check your outfit after you've taken it off. I don't mind waiting. Just come find me when you're ready. And thanks for your help, !
Oh good! Let's see it, then.
Ah, hmm I see<10_8 arg="130" />
Hmm, OK Interesting<10_8 arg="120" />

I want to give you something to show you how much I appreciate your help. Have you heard of tailors tickets? You can take a tailors ticket to the tailor shop and exchange it for an item that costs 3,000 Bells or less. Now, you can't use it at Timmy and Tommy's shop. Still, I hope you use it to buy something nice for yourself. I'll send my gift to you in the mail. So be sure to look for it there.
I'm going to send a thank-you gift to your home. Remember to use tailors tickets at the tailor shop, OK?
Andplease take this too. I made it with my own two paws.
Oh, hold on. It looks like you have too many things to carry already. I'll just send it to your home later.
This is a new design I just finished. I'm planning to have it sold at the tailor shop.
Well, I'm looking forward to seeing you again. Thank you for being so very helpful.

, you see? I hope you like the look. It's a design from my fashion label. I mean, my label is new, so it's not famous yet. It's called Labelle.I used to go by that name when I first set out to be a designer.But these days I'm using my real name—Label—while Labelle lives on in my, umfashion label. Oh. I hope that's not too confusing.
It's another design from my label . I hope you like the style.
I'm going to send a little gift to your home to show my appreciation.Just don't forget that tailors tickets are supposed to be used at the tailor shop, OK?
I want you to have this too. It's one of my own creations
Uh-oh. It looks like you're already carrying too many things.It's OK. I'll just send it to your house later.
It is a new design. I just finished it, in fact. And it's going to be sold at the tailor shop.
Well, thank you so much. I hope you'll consider helping me again in the future.
, you see. It's a piece from my very own label.
Now, be on the lookout for a gift I'm sending to your home. It's just I appreciate you sooo much. But don't forget that tailors tickets are to be used at the tailor shop, OK?
Oh, and here, take this as well. I made it with my own two paws. I'm quite proud of it
Oh, but You're carrying too much already. I can't load you down more. Don't fret. I'll send it over to your home later, no problem.
It's my newest creation.I do hope you like the look, because it'll be on display in the tailor shop soon.
Well, thank you so much. I'm really looking forward to the next time we meet.
, you see. It's from my brand. I'd love for you to have it.
I really appreciate your help. I hope we can do this again sometime.
Hmmwhat I need is a really good idea for a new clothing design.
I love to travel. Each new place I go teaches me something new.
I'm working on a sketch for my latest clothing design.I just became an independent designer, which is excitingbut if I'm being honest, it's also stressful.
Thank you for helping me out so much. I'm very fortunate.
Did you know that the Able Sisters are also MY sisters? They run the tailor shop on this island. I'm told we look quite similar. You might saywe're cut from the same cloth.
When I visit this island, sometimes I bring clothing and accessories I designed to the tailor shop.If you're interested, they'll be displayed at the shop the next day. Have a look if you like.
Slowly but surely, more and more design ideas have been coming to me. I thinkit's all because of you.
Your outfits make excellent reference material, . Thank you for the inspiration.
I come to this island to study fashion, of course, but also to see the Able Sistersand you.

What a truly wonderful place is. It's beautiful here and everyone is sooo kind. And, of course, you're here too. I can't help but be inspired.You know, , if I'm being honest, I'm a bit jealous my sisters get to live here.

I don't know how to tell you this, . I suppose I'll just come out and say it You've been a true inspiration. And it's because of you that I've learned so much about design. Thank you, . I'll never forget what you've done for me.
I'm always trying so hard to become a better fashion designer, but sometimes I just get stuck. And then, , you come along and I feel like everything will be OK.
Hmyesif it was a little moreOh, so sorry, !I was thinking about a new design and got lost in it for a minute there I do that sometimes.

You might have heard of me I worked under the designer name Labelle for a while. But I recently set out on my own independent design career, and went back to using my real nameLabel.A new start calls for a new name, you know. Ormaybe an old name.

So, you know how I used to go by the name Labelle?Well, I was given that name by someone I worked with once my mentor. They're a very famous fashion designer and I learned soooo much from them. I don't think I would be where I am today without their guidance.But you know what I've also learned a lot from you too, . You've helped me take my design career to the next level, as they say. And I can't thank you enough.
So, you're not from this island either? I just love visiting new places. There's so much to learn!
These islands are so full of natural beauty.That's why they're the perfect place to go for fashion inspiration.
I'm traveling to all kinds of places in a search for fashion inspiration.I'm visiting today, and, my goodness, there's so much I can learn from the folks here.

I see you've changed. Oh! Oh no! It looks like you're wearing a custom design. I'm sorry, but I can't evaluate your outfit properly when you have a custom design on. Would you mind getting changed and then showing me your outfit? I'd really appreciate it.

You changed your outfit for me, I see. Oh no! You're wearing a custom design, aren't you? I'm so sorry. I can't judge your outfit if there's a custom design mixed in. It'll throw things off, you see. If you could change your clothes and then show me your lookwell, that would be trés magnifique. That's just a little something all the famous designers say.
Can I take a look at your outfit?
Sure, of course.
Not yet.
Could you let me see your outfit?
Of course!
I'm not ready.
I'd love to see your outfit. That is, if you don't mind?
OK!
I need more time.
I'd like to review your outfit without a wet suit over the top. Thanks for helping me out.
Oh, are you about to go swimming? The sea here is very beautiful, isn't it? Justplease don't put on a wet suit when it's time for me to check your outfit. Thanks, I appreciate it.
So, I'd like you to show me a party outfit.Say you and your best friend were going to a fancy soiree. Just imagine the fabulous clothes you'd wear!
I'd like you to show me a sporty outfit.Try clothes that are comfortable to move around in, or maybe something an athlete would wear.
Now, I'd like you to show me a work outfit.Try something professional, like a suit. The clothes a chef or doctor would wear works too.
Try putting together an outfit that's super comfy.You know, something you'd wear if you were lounging around the house or, say, relaxing in front of the TV.

I'd love it if you showed me an outfit that's outdoorsy.Imagine you're going for a hike or perhaps camping. What would you wear? You could also try on some casual, loose-fitting clothes. Just imagine yourself at a picnic in the park.
Now, I'd like you to put together an outfit that looks like it belongs in a fairy tale. Let knights, princesses, and storybook characters of all kinds be your inspiration.
How about you show me your very best goth outfit? Thinkdark and moody! Try an outfit you might wear on Halloweenor one you might wear to scare your mother.

I'd like you to show me a theatrical outfitsomething that shouts, "I'm the star of the show!" It could be something a musician or a pop star might wear.You could also dress as if you were singing in an opera or acting in a play.

OK, I'd like you to show me an outfit that says, "I'm on vacation!"Just think about what you'd wear on a leisurely summer trip, or to one of those big resorts. Try imagining yourself relaxing in the countryside or soaking up the sun on a beach.
Now, I'd like you to show me a formal outfit.Try on the kind of super-nice clothes you'd wear to a fancy restaurantor your cousin's graduation ceremony.
I'd like you to show me an everyday outfit. You knowsomething you'd wear on any ordinary day. Try picking out simple-yet-stylish clothing you can wear for all sorts of occasions.
I don't think your outfit has quite the feel to it, butYes, I suppose you could go about it that way.It's given me something to think about, so thank you for that.
Your outfit has look to it and is very unique. I like it.Looking at your creation Yes, I have learned something new about clothing coordination. Thank you for that.
Yes, this is what I mean when I say I'm looking for style.What a superb combination of pieces. You've expressed the theme beautifully. I've learned so much. Thank you!
Wonderful! That's it exactly!Your combination of clothing radiates that perfect look. There's just so much I can learn from your sense of style. Thank you!
I'm not sure your outfit really has the flair I was looking forDon't get me wrong, it isan interesting choice. I'll definitely tuck it away for reference.
Your outfit does have a bit of the thing going onand some of your own unique style as well. You know, I think it has expanded my fashion horizons a bit. So thank you for that.
Oh, wow! You've really captured the look. Even the details are on point. Oh, , your outfits always teach me so much. Thank you for the fashion inspiration!

Amazing! I've never seen an outfit so perfectly coordinated!Each individual piece of clothing builds on the theme I was looking for. And it all comes together in fashion perfection. Your taste is impeccable, . I am sooo impressed. Thank you for putting it together for me!
